title: Storm Watch News.
content:
Welcome to Storm Watch News, your go-to source for the latest weather updates and breaking news on storms and natural disasters. Our team of experienced meteorologists and reporters work around the clock to bring you up-to-the-minute information on severe weather events happening in your area and across the globe. 

Stay informed with our real-time storm tracker and interactive maps, which allow you to follow storms as they develop and track their path. Our in-depth analysis and expert commentary provide valuable insights into the science behind these powerful weather phenomena.

In addition to weather coverage, we also report on the latest news related to climate change, environmental issues, and emergency preparedness. At Storm Watch News, we believe that staying informed is the first step towards staying safe during times of crisis. Join us today and be part of a community dedicated to keeping you and your loved ones safe and informed.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An abstract image of a stormy sky with lightning bolts for a weather or news website"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
